title: What was the first champion you remember being released?
body:
Just for a bit of fun!
For me it was Wukong

replies.body: my first champion release was {{champion:101}}  ... long time ago now
Do you have like a split between the champions before Xearth and after, as like new v. old!
Irelia, back in the days of a champion release literally every 2 weeks.

Mordekaiser, I think.
But defiantly remember Kennen and Olaf

I joined just before the Nidalee update. 

So... Gnar? Or maybe Braum and I just didn't realise it. lol
kha6 or elise, I joined around then.
